Package model.evaluable

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BinaryOperator
    This interface represents a binary operator of the PPAL logic.
    Evaluable
    This interface represents a structure of the PPAL logic capable of evaluation to a real number, given a Society (which contains a SocietyModel) and a State.
    EvaluationFunction
    This interface represents an evaluation function of the PPAL logic.
    Operator
    This interface represents an operator of the PPAL logic.
    Proposition
    This interface represents a logic proposition of the PPAL logic.
    TernaryOperator
    This interface represents a ternary operator of the PPAL logic.
    UnaryOperator
    This interface represents an unary operator of the PPAL logic.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicConjunctionOperator
    This class implements a fuzzy conjunction binary operator of the PPAL logic.
    BasicDisjunctionOperator
    This class implements a fuzzy disjunction binary operator of the PPAL logic.
    BasicEvaluationFunction
    This class implements a basic evaluation function of the PPAL logic.
    BasicImplicationOperator
    This class implements a basic implication function of the PPAL logic.
    BasicKnowledgeOperator
    This class implements a fuzzy knowledge ternary operator (Populations or Groups) of the PPAL logic.
    BasicNegationOperator
    This class implements a fuzzy negation unary operator of the PPAL logic.
    BasicProposition
    This class implements a basic proposition of the PPAL logic.
